SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into t_activity (student_name, mobile_phone, email, parent_name, `status`, parent_call, creat_time, execute_time) values (#{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentCall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{executeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update t_activity set student_name = #{studentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile_phone = #{mobilePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_name = #{parentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, parent_call = #{parentCall,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, creat_time = #{creatTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, execute_time = #{executeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, student_name, mobile_phone, email, parent_name, `status`, parent_call, creat_time, execute_time from t_activity where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, student_name, mobile_phone, email, parent_name, `status`, parent_call, creat_time, execute_time from t_activity
